#  Best Bluetooth Headphone

##  Top Selected Products and Reviews

* * *

[ ![Mpow 059 Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear, Hi-Fi Stereo Wireless Headset,
Foldable, Soft Memory-Protein Earmuffs, w/Built-in Mic Wired Mode, for
Online Class, Home Office, PC/Cell Phones/TV](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif)![Mpow 059 Bluetooth
Headphones Over Ear, Hi-Fi Stereo Wireless Headset, Foldable, Soft Memory-
Protein Earmuffs, w/Built-in Mic Wired Mode, for   Online Class, Home Office,
PC/Cell Phones/TV](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/617XS3ZQgUL._SR500,500_.jpg) ](/Mpow-Bluetooth-Headphones-
Wireless-Memory-Protein/dp/B01NAJGGA2?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_1)

[ Mpow 059 Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear, Hi-Fi Stereo Wireless Headset,
Foldable, Soft Memory-Protein Earmuffs, w/Built-in Mic Wired Mode, for Online
Class, Home Office, PC/Cell Phones/TV ](/Mpow-Bluetooth-Headphones-Wireless-
Memory-Protein/dp/B01NAJGGA2?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_1)

by [ Mpow ](/stores/Mpow/page/77AF42AF-B598-48DD-
AA53-3386F4E24647?ref_=ast_bln&ref_=fsclp_pl_s_1)

"Very nice value for bluetooth headphones (foldable / wired AND wireless /
good build quality)"  \- by  J. Nastri  (Maryland, MD United States)

Need a nice value bluetooth headphones with durability, good sound quality, &
can be wireless OR wired? This MPOW headphone is it!  
  
*Unit Operational Test*  
This is a pretty simple unit to test. I started with testing fitment /
adjustment to my head using the sliders (stainless steel sliders, nicely
done!) while also testing the ability for folding the headphones (worked
great, very solid feeling). The memory foam ear cushions and along the inside
of the headphone band where the top of your head will touch feel very
comfortable with good spring in the foam. It is an attractive set of
headphones, good use of contrast red, silver, and black. The device is touted
to NOT be active noise canceling so we'll test passive noise reduction with
the over-the-ears cushions.  
  
The device has user controls on one side (power, volume up, volume down, track
forward, track reverse, play / pause) on the right-ear ...[ full
review](/review/R35WX3YYIFLODD)

__[ (34,954) ](/product-reviews/B01NAJGGA2?ref_=fsclp_pl_nr_1)

[ COWIN E7 Active Noise Cancelling Headphones Bluetooth Headphones with

Earpads, 30 Hours Playtime for Travel/Work, Black ](/Cancelling-Headphones-
Bluetooth-Microphone-Comfortable/dp/B019U00D7K?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_2)

by [ cowin
](/stores/cowin/page/491CF957-AE7A-4394-AA5D-D0CA188D4415?ref_=ast_bln&ref_=fsclp_pl_s_2)

""ESCAPE THE NOISE""  \- by  Paul  (ARIZONA DESERT)

"TUNE OUT THE WORLD, FOR $70" Noise cancelling that works at a very reasonable
price! Give BOSE credit for a great idea but the "concept" is well out of the
barn! These phones sound great, are very comfortable to wear, 30 hour play
time and if you do manage to run down the batt. just plug them in to the wired
input to connect the phones to the player and keep listening.  
As I tried to quickly discuss in the video the fit and comfort of these phones
will vary with different size and shape heads so you'll just have to try them
on. (think shoes) As far as sound, I am a retired professional studio
musician, trumpet player, and I've used headphones that would sell for around
$5,000 at today's prices, so let's not go crazy comparing apples & oranges! At
$70 these are a great deal and you ...[ full review](/review/RV6EBFIYN5W6Q)

Headphones-Bluetooth-Cancellation/dp/B0721MP41Q?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_3)

[ [Upgraded] Anker Soundbuds Curve Wireless Headphones, 18H Battery, IPX7
Waterproof Bluetooth Headphones, Bluetooth 5.0, Built in Mic and Carry Pouch,
SweatGuard Technology for Workout, Gym, Running ](/Anker-SoundBuds-Headphones-
Bluetooth-Cancellation/dp/B0721MP41Q?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_3)

by [ Soundcore
](/stores/Soundcore/page/AD6AD8C0-90C7-4C65-8000-0AC741FA2633?ref_=ast_bln&ref_=fsclp_pl_s_3)

"Anker SoundBuds Curve is almost as good as Apple's Powerbeats 3, but costs
1/5! Exceptional value."  \- by  Pete from California

My Powerbeats 3 kept on breaking, so I bought this instead. The sound quality
is I would say about 4/5 as good as Powerbeats 3. The bass is a bit
overpowering. However, these cost 1/5 of what Apple charges for Powerbeats 3.
I must say Anker Soundbuds Curve delivers an exceptional value.

What a great purchase! Didn't know these came with both FM and an equalization
adjustment capability! You've got to be kidding me! Will definitely repurchase
for gifts and they'll probably think I spent lots on these great sounding
headsets. get yours!

Waterproof, 10H Playtime, Bluetooth 5.0, Magnetic Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth
Earbuds for Workout , Sports, Running, Gym](https://images-na.ssl-images-
amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif)![Bluetooth Headphones,
Anker SoundBuds Slim Wireless Headphones, IPX7 Waterproof, 10H Playtime,
Bluetooth 5.0, Magnetic Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth Earbuds for Workout ,
Sports, Running, Gym](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/51Eq+RDiiXL._SR500,500_.jpg) ](/Anker-Headphones-
Lightweight-Connection-Sweatproof/dp/B01N6DC2ZE?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_8)

[ Bluetooth Headphones, Anker SoundBuds Slim Wireless Headphones, IPX7
Waterproof, 10H Playtime, Bluetooth 5.0, Magnetic Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth
Earbuds for Workout , Sports, Running, Gym ](/Anker-Headphones-Lightweight-
Connection-Sweatproof/dp/B01N6DC2ZE?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_8)

by [ Soundcore
](/stores/Soundcore/page/AD6AD8C0-90C7-4C65-8000-0AC741FA2633?ref_=ast_bln&ref_=fsclp_pl_s_8)

"Worth more than you pay: an audiophile review"  \- by  Ali

I am not easily impressed by headphones. I have used everything from Beats to
Bose, Shure, to custom molded headphones. Some of my headphones easily cost 20
times if not more than what I paid for these sound buds. I wasn't really
expecting much from these. Truth be told, I only bought them because I wanted
headphones I can make phone calls with. They have a mic, check, buy.  
  
PROS:  
I gave them a listen and wow. These sound good, very good, too good for their
price. Bass is present, but not overpowering and the highs and mids are clean
with minimal distortion.  
  
They're also easy to pair (I've been switching these from my iPhone to Macbook
pro with ease). Calls are clear and no one I've talked to has reported any
issues with hearing me.  
  
The magnets are a nice touch allowing me to keep ...[ full
review](/review/R12YH1QHWZ0Z2O)

Waterproof-Sweatproof-Cancelling/dp/B07DXSYJ5N?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_9)

[ LETSCOM Bluetooth Headphones V5.0 IPX7 Waterproof, Wireless Sport Earphones,
HiFi Bass Stereo Sweatproof Earbuds w/Mic, Noise Cancelling Headset for
Workout, Running, Gym, 8 Hours Play Time ](/LETSCOM-Headphones-Waterproof-
Sweatproof-Cancelling/dp/B07DXSYJ5N?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_9)

by [ LETSCOM ](/stores/LETSCOM/page/09CA78DA-
EDB8-48BF-A7A0-4EECFD5F5090?ref_=ast_bln&ref_=fsclp_pl_s_9)

"excellent value, excellent sound"  \- by  Chattinwithme

These are excellent headphones! The sound is clear with both music/videos and
phone calls. The caller can be heard very clearly, as well as, the caller can
hear me with no background noise (other people or car and road sounds). I
purchased a different set a couple weeks ago and had many complaints that the
caller could not hear me or I sounded like I was in a tunnel, not the case
with these. I am impressed with the quality!!

"Soft earpads, quality and fashion looklike, really fast connection with
iphone"  \- by  Burak YILMAZ

Quality is really good, and earpads are extremely soft(when i was reading
reviews about it i was most scared about earache situations(!)) .  
Im using with ios and i never had issue, immediate connection.  
Battery life more than okay for this price.  
If you are music listener sound is clean and clear. If i match with another
headsets what i had before and material about $200-$300 scala worth it.

[ Mpow Flame Bluetooth Headphones V5.0 IPX7 Waterproof Wireless headphones,
Bass+ HD Stereo Wireless Sport Earbuds, 7-9Hrs Playtime, cVc6.0 Noise
Cancelling Mic for Home Workout, Running, Gym Red ](/Mpow-Headphones-
Waterproof-Cancelling-Microphone/dp/B0753GRNQZ?ref_=fsclp_pl_dp_11)

by [ Mpow ](/stores/Mpow/page/77AF42AF-B598-48DD-
AA53-3386F4E24647?ref_=ast_bln&ref_=fsclp_pl_s_11)

"Great For The Money!"  \- by  Richard  (Nashville)

First let’s start with the good news. At a price point of $20, this headset is
absolutely great! It pairs easily, the built in microphone works (the main
comment I’ve heard from people I called was that I sounded the same as
always), it is light and comfortable and comes with a case and extra ear
buttons in multiple sizes. As for function, with my iPhone I can use the
headset’s buttons to start, stop, jump forward, jump backward and control
volume (while listening to music or audiobooks). I can also answer or end
calls. The only thing it won’t do is access Siri as holding the main button
down functions to turn the headset off or on. That said, you will have to
physically engage Siri using the button on your phone but you can still talk
through the headset.  
  
For the price you ...[ full review](/review/R13BXCXH5N604S)
